name: Homewings
description: Homewings is an online interior design service that delivers a truly personalised shopping experience, for everyone. Constantly building and innovating, every member of our team works together to exceed the expectations of both our clients and our designers.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Chesco Igual
team.bioHtml: I love how coding brings ideas to life, working in strong teams. Python backend engineer since 2012. Ansible devops. Professional Scrum Master.

jobs.title: Executive Assistant
jobs.description:
Who we are:

Homewings is unlike anything in the world of furniture and technology. Our mission: change the way the world designs and furnishes homes. We have rapidly grown into becoming the number one online interior design company in the UK since our launch in 2016, and we are planning on continuing to grow further and faster. 

Responsibilities will include:

For now this job is many roles bundled in to one: office manager, company secretary, HR and executive assistant. We are looking for a generalist who is not afraid on picking up a range of different tasks daily. You will perform a myriad of job functions and your role is integral to the continued achievement and employee satisfactoriness at Homewings. 

Assisting the organisation's HR function by keeping personnel records up to date, arranging interviews and so on
Organising induction programmes for new employees
Implementing and maintaining procedures/office administrative systems
Organise company events both internally and externally
Rack daily expenses and prepare weekly, monthly or quarterly reports
Act as an office manager by keeping up with office supply inventory
Various accounting and reconciliation tasks 
Produce reports, presentations and briefs
Prepare Board papers and draft and finalise minutes.
Maintain all governance documents
Act as the central contact point for all staff in connection with liaising with the founders including maintaining an up to date list of the contact details of staff.

Ideal Person Specification

Energetic, upbeat and enthusiastic
Professional, discreet and confidential
Quick learner
Excellent administration and organisational skills
Can do attitude and flexibility and goes the extra mile
Work experience as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant or similar role
PA diploma or certification is a plus

Please apply today if this sounds like the role you have been waiting for! It is essential that applicants have outstanding communication skills (both written and verbal).

jobs.title: COO
jobs.description:
With thousands of beautiful rooms designed, Homewings is transforming the future of real estate industry.  

Homewings started a little over two years ago, and is now active in several European markets. 

The COO position is one of the most challenging and impactful roles at Homewings. As the COO of Homewings you oversee the overall growth and performance of the business. You will have full P&L ownership and are ultimately accountable for scaling the company and consistently delivering on our brand and service promise.

If you have an entrepreneurial mindset and natural desire to get stuff done, we definitely want to hear from you.

At Homewings You Will

Oversee all business operations
Oversees daily operations and manage them as a profit center
Measure effectiveness and efficiency of operational processes both internally and externally and find ways to improve processes
Drive quality assurance
Motivates staff to meet or surpass organisational and sales goals

Own and manage the UK P&L

Develop an understanding of the current and desired state of business, working cross functionally and cross channels as needed to develop strategies and execute operational plans to advance the business forward
Forecast volume turnover and review all the key operations parameters periodically and plan accordingly
Collaborate with senior leadership and founders in setting strategies and OKRs for you and your teams
Build a solid process to deliver projects at scale - domestically and internationally by working closely with interior designers, operations team, sales and 3rd party providers.
Communicate product/process needs to wider team
Help scale through developing and sharing best practices

What We Look For

• 10-15+ years of work experience in operations, management, professional services or other related fields
• Analytical and data driven decision making mentality
• Experience with or strong excitement for building a startup from the ground up
• Proven track record of managing high performance teams
• Excellent team player with strong written and verbal communication skills
• Comfortable working cross-functionally to make your role successful
• Out-of-the-box thinker who will find creative ways to hit growth targets

We also have great benefits to make your life easier so you can focus on what you're best at:

• Competitive salary
• Generous stock option plan
• A company with a huge vision, a dynamic work environment, and a team of smart, ambitious and fun to work-with colleagues!

Ps: here are a few articles we like: 

https://firstround.com/review/to-grow-faster-hit-pause-and-ask-these-questions-from-stripes-coo/
https://firstround.com/review/Keith-Rabois-on-the-role-of-a-COO-how-to-hire-and-why-transparency-matters/

jobs.title: Marketing and Partnerships Manager (B2B)
jobs.description:
Marketing and Partnerships Manager (B2B)

Homewings

The role

As the Marketing and partnership manager you will help drive top-of-funnel acquisition. You will drive initiatives that focus on raising the awareness of Homewings, creating effective nurturing programmes and driving acquisition. It’s a unique opportunity for an energetic, enthusiastic and focused self-starter who is ready to roll up their sleeves, get creative and make their mark in a fast-growing company.

You will be expected to be a problem solver, managing activities, being strong at analysis and reporting in order to make quickly but well informed decisions. Testing and learning quickly are key components of this role.

You will:

- Work hand-in-hand with the Homewings sales team to grow the Homewings brand.
- Develop deeper partnerships with our existing accounts
- Build brand recognition in specific b2b channels 
- Write aspirational content that speaks to different target audiences 
- Manage all facets of content and brand marketing; from Before & After content writing and photoshoot management, to ideating & executing innovative cross-channel campaigns.
- Build and nurture strategic partnerships and think of innovative ways of reaching potential clients through partnership and co-branded activities.

You Are:

-Experience of B2B lead generation using various digital channels 
An experienced content writer/creator. 
- Fluent in data, numbers and not afraid of sales activities.
- Strong understanding of social media marketing. 
- A resourceful self-starter that is never satisfied with 'good enough', and loves a steep learning curve.
- Passionate about what we are building here at Homewings, and an interest in interior design. 
- Native or fluent English speaker with excellent written and verbal skills.
- A people-person who enjoys working within a team. 
- Able to build professional relationships naturally - reliable and consistent
- Photoshop and/or Indesign experience is a nice-to-have.
